left_dialogue.dialogue: I'm a big meat eater myself

middle_dialogue.dialogue: I think my customers would like a metallic taste
middle_dialogue.response: You know I quite agree with that

left_dialogue.dialogue: I'm a big fan of lead myself
left_dialogue.response: I know a liar when I see one

middle_dialogue.dialogue: I was thinking that I needed a mercury couli
middle_dialogue.response: Nice try, I'm a solid hunk of meat

right_dialogue.dialogue: I think you come from some sort of cow
right_dialogue.response: Wow, an educated chef. I trust you'll do well

right_dialogue.dialogue: I've never seen a meat like you before
right_dialogue.response: I don't really care if you have or haven't
